analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta dus rnams su //

original: de phyir yang dag mtshan brjod go ba yis //
analyzed: de phyir yang dag mtshan brjod go ba yis //
translated: Therefore, those who understand the true characteristics

original: 'khor 'das ye shes sems dpa'i lus rig bya //
analyzed: 'khor 'das ye shes sems dpa'i lus rig bya //

original: rdul dang mun pa snying stobs gsum gyi bdag / de nyid yin phyir sems kyis sun mi dbyung //
analyzed: rdul dang mun pa snying stobs gsum gyi bdag / de nyid yin phyir sems kyis sun mi dbyung //

original: phung po lnga yi khur bor nyan thos rnams //
analyzed: phung po lnga yi khur bor nyan thos rnams //
translated: The hearers abandon the burden of the five aggregates,

original: lam gyi dang por 'bad de gzung bar bya //
analyzed: lam gyi dang por 'bad de gzung bar bya //
translated: And should be held with effort at the beginning of the path.

original: rang rgyal theg pa bag med spong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rang rgyal theg pa bag med spong ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to abandon the carelessness of the Pratyekabuddhayana,

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don la bslab //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don la bslab //
translated: One should train in the meaning of dependent origination.

original: dge chos tshol la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten ;
analyzed: dge chos tshol la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten ;
translated: In seeking virtuous dharmas, one should rely on a spiritual friend.

original: / shes rab gsum ni shes rab kyis shes bya //
analyzed: / shes rab gsum ni shes rab kyis shes bya //
translated: The three wisdoms are known through wisdom.

original: zad pa shes pas rnam par dag 'gyur te //
analyzed: zad pa shes pas rnam par dag 'gyur te //
translated: Through the knowledge of exhaustion, one will be purified.

original: skye med shes pas ye shes lus su 'gyur //
analyzed: skye med shes pas ye shes lus su 'gyur //
translated: Through the knowledge of non-arising, one will have the body of wisdom.

original: skad cig gcig la rnam par grol ba ni //
analyzed: skad cig gcig la rnam par grol ba ni //
translated: Liberation in a single instant

original: rang rig ngo bor sangs rgyas thams cad 'chang //
analyzed: rang rig ngo bor sangs rgyas thams cad 'chang //
translated: Is the nature of self-awareness, holding all the buddhas.

original: yul dang dbang po bde bar byin brlabs pas//
analyzed: yul dang dbang po bde bar byin brlabs pas//
translated: By blessing the objects and sense faculties as bliss,

original: ye shes sems dpa'i lus su bdag rdzogs 'gyur //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i lus su bdag rdzogs 'gyur //
translated: One's own perfection becomes the body of the wisdom being.

original: thams cad dge bar mthong bas mi dge med //
analyzed: thams cad dge bar mthong bas mi dge med //
translated: Seeing everything as virtuous, there is no nonvirtue.

original: snying rje chen po'i cha las sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i cha las sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: From the aspect of great compassion, there are various forms.

original: rgyu lam 'bras bu kun du dgag mi bya //
analyzed: rgyu lam 'bras bu kun du dgag mi bya //
translated: The cause, path, and result should not be completely negated.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pas stong pa nyid //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pas stong pa nyid //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is emptiness.

original: dus gsum du ni mi gnas 'pho ba med //
analyzed: dus gsum du ni mi gnas 'pho ba med //
translated: It does not abide in the three times and is without transition.

original: bde ba chen po'i mngal du yid zhugs na //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i mngal du yid zhugs na //
translated: When the mind enters the womb of great bliss,

original: rnal 'byor yid la mi byed bla ma'i sku //
analyzed: rnal 'byor yid la mi byed bla ma'i sku //
translated: The guru‚Äôs body is the yoga of no mental activity.üîΩWith objects and antidotes, and with seeing,

original: yul dang gnyen por bcas dang mthong ba dang // der shes pa dang nu ba pa'i ye shes nyid //
analyzed: yul dang gnyen por bcas dang mthong ba dang // der shes pa dang nu ba pa'i ye shes nyid //
translated: The wisdom of recognition and the wisdom of certainty

original: rtsa ba bral ba'i sems ni brtan pa la //
analyzed: rtsa ba bral ba'i sems ni brtan pa la //
translated: Are the stable mind free from a root.

original: rgod dang g-yeng ba'i dri mas gos mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rgod dang g-yeng ba'i dri mas gos mi 'gyur //
translated: It is not tainted by the stains of agitation and distraction.

original: rang 'byung ye shes brtan dang thos @135b pa yis //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes brtan dang thos @135b pa yis //
translated: The stable and the heard

original: brtags pa'i rgyu ba rnams la gnas pa med //
analyzed: brtags pa'i rgyu ba rnams la gnas pa med //
translated: Do not abide in the movements of the imagined.

original: 'khrul pa zhig pas snang ba'i rgyu ba bral //
analyzed: 'khrul pa zhig pas snang ba'i rgyu ba bral //
translated: Delusion is destroyed, and the movement of appearances is absent.

original: dbye ba spangs pa ye shes sems dpa'i gnas //
analyzed: dbye ba spangs pa ye shes sems dpa'i gnas //
translated: The abode of the wisdom being is free from divisions.

original: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig bying rmugs med //
analyzed: yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig bying rmugs med //
translated: The path of the perfect buddhas is free from dullness and torpor.

original: nges 'byung mtha' la gnas pa the tshom med //
analyzed: nges 'byung mtha' la gnas pa the tshom med //
translated: Abiding at the end of renunciation is free from doubt.

original: rgyun chad med pa'i ye shes 'gyod pa spangs//
analyzed: rgyun chad med pa'i ye shes 'gyod pa spangs//
translated: The wisdom of the absence of interruption is free from regret.

original: nyon mongs gnyen po mi byed le lo min //
analyzed: nyon mongs gnyen po mi byed le lo min //
translated: The antidotes to the afflictions are not laziness.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pas zhum pa med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig pas zhum pa med //
translated: Since all buddhas are one, there is no discouragement.

original: 'khor ba rnam par dag pas gnyid sogs bral //
analyzed: 'khor ba rnam par dag pas gnyid sogs bral //
translated: Since samsara is pure, one is free from sleep and so on.

original: yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: Since all qualities are complete, one is a vajra holder.

original: rang bzhin chos la gnas pas thob bya spangs //
analyzed: rang bzhin chos la gnas pas thob bya spangs //
translated: Since one abides in the natural Dharma, the attainment is abandoned.

original: rdo rje lta bu yin phyir bdud tham gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu yin phyir bdud tham gyur //
translated: Since one is like a vajra, one is beyond mƒÅras.

original: dgos pa med pa'i gnas thob shin tu bde //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i gnas thob shin tu bde //
translated: Having attained the state of no purpose, one is very happy.

original: kun rdzob rnam par dag pas ae ma mtshar //
analyzed: kun rdzob rnam par dag pas ae ma mtshar //
translated: Since the relative is pure, how amazing!

original: bcom ldan mgon po gang gi lung thob pas //
analyzed: bcom ldan mgon po gang gi lung thob pas //
translated: Since one has obtained the transmission of the BhagavƒÅn protector,

original: rgyud dngos grub pa sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bya //
analyzed: rgyud dngos grub pa sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bya //
translated: this method of accomplishing the siddhis of the tantra is performed.

original: phun sum tshogs 'gyur tshogs gnyis 'bras bu gang //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs 'gyur tshogs gnyis 'bras bu gang //
translated: May the two accumulations, which become perfect, and their resultüîΩbe obtained by migrating beings at this time.
